name: Game of Thrones: Episode Five - A Nest of Vipers
name_original: Game of Thrones: Episode Five - A Nest of Vipers
description:
Game of Thrones: Episode Five - A Nest of Vipers is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 21-07-2015. It was published by Telltale Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Game of Thrones: Episode Five - A Nest of Vipers is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
